certifications.name: IBM Data Science Professional Certificate
certifications.description: Completed IBM Data Science Professional Certificate, mastering Python, SQL, and Machine Learning through hands-on projects and cloud-based implementations.

certifications.name: IBM Machine Learning Specialization
certifications.description: IBM's 6-course Professional Certificate in Machine Learning equips learners with expertise in supervised, unsupervised, deep, and reinforcement learning—including time series and survival analysis—through hands-on practice, aligning with AI's 74% annual hiring growth.

certifications.name: DeepLearning.AI TensorFlow Developer
certifications.description: DeepLearning.AI's 4-course TensorFlow Developer Professional Certificate hones expertise in neural networks, image recognition with convolutions, NLP systems, and TensorFlow frameworks—key skills for shaping AI-powered innovations.

certifications.name: DeepLearning.AI Natural Language Processing Specialization
certifications.description: DeepLearning.AI's 4-course NLP Specialization equips me with classical and cutting-edge deep learning techniques to build systems for translation, sentiment analysis, text summarization, and question-answering—critical skills for advancing AI-driven language innovations.
